name: Youth Programs
description: Through engaging activities, educational initiatives, and partnership programs, Italian Community Services aims to inspire the next generation to embrace their Italian roots while offering a nurturing environment that encourages personal growth, cultural appreciation, and meaningful connections within the community.

whatTheyOffer: Through engaging activities, educational initiatives, and partnership programs, Italian Community Services aims to inspire the next generation to embrace their Italian roots while offering a nurturing environment that encourages personal growth, cultural appreciation, and meaningful connections within the community.
howToGetIt: Call or email for more information.
